ComicInfo.Summary:
Where's Glamourpuss? Fortunately most of this issue was 'in the can' before Comics' Greatest Fashion Maven went missing. Cover preview for the proposed glamourtween title, gammagpooz hosts the 3-page fashion horror story, 'The Thinker,' plus a cameo appearance by Cerebus (don't blink or you'll miss him) in his Porsche Carrera 1984 sports car. And Aardvark-Vanaheim continues its 'outreach to the undead' with its second zombie cover, written in the Zombie's own distinctive and emotive language!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/glamourpuss-5/4000-151410/
ComicInfo.Title: Jeff Jones; Poo-Pourri; Pedo Asfixia; The Thinker
